name: Deathmatch

refinement_effect.refine_one: If there are at least 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: If there are at least 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 20% and DEF is increased by 20%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 30%.

description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
